channel.id: Crime and Investigation Network HDTV (CI HD)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Mike Bloom, president and COO of discount retail chain Family Dollar, intends to double its number of stores within a few years. He decides that to do so he first needs to go incognito within the organisation to monitor where the firm is excelling and where it needs improvement.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Eric Casaburi, a former undercover boss, invites six other employers who also appeared incognito on the show to talk about their experiences of the programme at a restaurant. However, little do they realise that Eric is going to try to fool them by appearing as a waiter. Featuring Kat Cole, Paul Damico, Andy Wiederhorn, Sheldon Yellen, Anthony Wedo and Jane Grote Abell.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Travis Boersma, co-founder and president of one of the largest privately owned drive-through coffee shop chains in America, goes undercover to learn whether the culture he and his brother hoped to implement is being upheld by the company's front-line employees.(n)

programme.title: Best of Both Worlds
programme.desc: Lucy Alexander helps a retired couple searching for a house in south Wales, as well as two keen sailors who want a property in Hampshire with easy access to the sea and London.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Jonnie Irwin helps newlyweds Iris and Alan Ford from Kent, who with a budget of £300,000 are hoping to split their retirement between the UK and the island of Tobago in the Caribbean.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Retired couple Sue and Dave Atkins from Norwich have spent their time travelling since finishing work, and have now decided the Tampa Bay area in Florida is the best place to escape the cold British weather. With a budget of just over £100,000, Sara Damergi shows them five ideal properties.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.sub-title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun: Davenport, Florida.
programme.desc: Angela and Michael Sidebotham from Lincolnshire are ready to fulfil their life-long dreams of buying a home in Davenport, Florida, where they plan to spend half of each year. With a budget of £160,000, Sara Damergi shows the couple five properties that meet their requirements.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Kerry Herbert from Brighton has dreamed of buying a property on Grenada since she visited the Caribbean island as a child. With her teenage son about to fly the nest and after dealing with the loss of her father, she has decided to take the plunge and buy somewhere that she, her son and her partner can enjoy. Jonnie Irwin helps shows her five properties - but it remains to be seen whether any of them will tempt Kerry to make an offer.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Sara Damergi searches the Kissimmee area of Florida to find a holiday home suitable for mother and daughter Jane and Bethan Thomas, who wish to buy a place close by the sunshine state's theme parks that they adore so much. Within their £70,000 budget, the options include a two-bedroom apartment and a three-bedroom lakeside house that offers a promising rental return.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: A few years ago Kieran Alexander was involved in a serious motorbike accident that has given her, and partner Dave Dwyer, a new outlook on life - that it is for living and there is no time like the present. They've decided to leave their stressful lives in the UK behind and start again in the Azores in the Atlantic. With a budget of £100,000 to fund their new home, Ben Hillman shows them five properties on the main island of Sao Miguel.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Laura Hamilton shows retired couple Angela and Bernie Ward five properties in Cyprus, hoping that on a budget of £185,000, one of them will prove to be their dream home.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer help two couples looking for somewhere to live in Buckinghamshire, where they can combine high-flying careers in the capital with peaceful small-town life for their young families. Shane and Annamarie Mugan have a budget of £850,000, but have not found their ideal home after viewing more than 50 properties, while Emma and Andrew Jarvis face tough competition as they search for a four-bedroom house with plenty of character.(n)

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: A 36-year-old man is rushed to St George's after being involved in a high-speed road traffic collision, with CT scans revealing a potentially life-threatening injury to his spleen. Meanwhile, a 21-year-old who dislocated his finger scoring the winning points in a basketball match believes his trip to A&E is the perfect subject for one of his vlogs.(n)

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: A 58-year-old woman is brought into the hospital after being run over by a lorry, suffering severe blood loss. Doctors are concerned that nerves and tissue in her leg may have suffered irreparable damage. Meanwhile, a 65-year-old man is treated after falling from a loft ladder, and a mischievous 85-year-old shows signs of severe dehydration.(n)

programme.title: The World's Weirdest Weather
programme.desc: Icebergs explode into thousands of pieces in Antarctica, locals film a rare snowstorm in the Saudi Arabian desert, and more than 10,000 seabirds are killed off the north-west coast of America when storms churn up algae in the waters, creating deadly sea foam. In Canada, tourists witness a full-circle rainbow, and a firefighter in Texas is caught up in a wave of hail so large that it shuts down the highway.(n)

programme.title: The Supervet
programme.desc: Professor Noel Fitzpatrick pushes the boundaries of veterinary medicine, and treats a German shepherd puppy that needs surgery on his hips and front leg using groundbreaking cell treatment. The vet must also perform delicate surgery on a Chihuahua suffering from a neck deformity compressing its spinal cord - however, one false move could be fatal. Plus, a rescue dog with deformed front legs is brought into the surgery.(n)

programme.title: The Supervet
programme.desc: Professor Noel Fitzpatrick performs a risky procedure to save the life of an 18-week-old cockapoo puppy that has fractured its neck following an accident in the garden. He also comes to the aid of Romanian stray Geoffrey, who was found abandoned and emaciated before being adopted by Kent couple John and Stacey, and an accident-prone cat called MK who has fallen from a window.(n)

programme.title: Ackley Bridge
programme.desc: Mandy's personal and professional lives collide with one another when Alya reveals her and Sadiq's affair at the school's first open day. As Mandy fights for her job, but chooses to put her pupils before her career, Steve comes to her rescue. Will it be enough to repair their relationship? Meanwhile, Candice discloses the true identity of Jamie's father, leading Jordan to spiral out of control. Chloe gets caught up in Jordan's plans to leave Ackley Bridge, only for them to fall foul of the police. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay visits Starkville, Mississippi, to try to rescue the failing Hotel Chester. Despite having more than 40 years' experience in the business, owner David Mollendor is at a loss as to how to make his dream of owning his own hotel work, while his wife Sukie is struggling as its chef, tackling the role without any formal catering experience. Gordon discovers a family tragedy that explains why this couple have become trapped in their business and wrestling with debt.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay visits a dog-friendly hotel in West Dover, Vermont, that is in urgent need of help. Owner Sandy MacDougall runs the Four Seasons Inn like a hostel, with unpaid staff staying in the rooms instead of paying guests. The acerbic chef aims to get the business back on track before Sandy loses everything, but wonders whether it would be kinder to simply put this dog-friendly hotel to sleep.(n)

programme.title: Tried and Tasted: The Ultimate Shopping List
programme.desc: Chef Michel Roux Jr and a panel of food experts blind taste-test some of the nation's favourite food and drink. Joining the host is restaurant manager and First Dates' Fred Sirieix, journalist, broadcaster and critic Jay Rayner, baker and deli owner Stacie Stewart, and TV presenter and foodie mum Lucy Alexander. The panel this week choose between four different brands of steak and ale pie, houmous and sauvignon blanc - the UK's most popular wine. Plus, the quick-fire public test is for cola drinks.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawnbrokers
programme.desc: Larry from Cashbrokers in Penzance goes to look at some antique petrol pumps, while in south-east London childhood sweethearts want to pawn their jewellery to fund a family reunion.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawnbrokers
programme.desc: Dan takes his sister to test drive a monster truck, Wendy comes across a handbag that could be very valuable, and Larry and Neil examine some works of art bought in a pub.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer help two couples from Gloucestershire who are looking for properties to reflect the change of direction their lives have taken. Cosmopolitan couple Mel and Jon hope to adopt a child, and are looking for a family home in the Cotswolds, while Isobel and Chris are soon to be married, and want to buy their first house together.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Paul Quentel, president of Alfred Angelo, the second largest bridal retailer in the United States, goes undercover to solve any problems as quickly as possible. Posing as a contestant on a reality TV competition, he works among his own staff.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Mike Bloom, president and COO of discount retail chain Family Dollar, intends to double its number of stores within a few years. He decides that to do so he first needs to go incognito within the organisation to monitor where the firm is excelling and where it needs improvement.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition kicks off at the Five Bells near Dover, where manager Shelley Parnell and her competitive mum Linda Yates hope their bargain-priced B&B will win the day.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Kennels owner Dean Faulkner is keen to impress as he hosts the first dinner party in Cambridge, where his guests are beauty school co-ordinator Kay Greenwood, gardening enthusiast Matt Sullivan, headstrong international development manager Hawa Sydique and the Beatles-obsessed Dave Goodier.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Beauty school co-ordinator Kay Greenwood hosts the second dinner party in Cambridge, hoping her tempura prawns and beef stroganoff will win her the £1,000 prize. One guest is sceptical about her chances of success, but changes his mind when he samples her unique entertainment.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Gardening enthusiast Matt Sullivan hosts the third dinner party in Cambridge, where his home-grown English menu of `posh' fish and chips and rice pudding surprises his guests. Rather than focusing on the cooking, he creates his own school fete and tries to wow everyone with a selection of outdoor games as he vies for the £1,000 prize.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: International development manager Hawa Sydique hosts the fourth dinner party from Cambridge, and her adventurous menu seems to cause more problems than it is worth. However, she hopes to impress with the 20-piece samba band in her living room, but the other guests are a little overwhelmed.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Beatles-loving Scouser David Goodier hosts the final dinner party in Cambridge and is determined to impress his guests with a 1960s Merseybeat dress code and courses entitled `Spicy Beatballs' and `Tir-Mersey-su'. As the evening draws to a close, the winner of the £1,000 cash prize is revealed.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer visit Hastings to help two couples look for their dream homes. However, with extravagant ideas and limited budgets on the agenda, they have their work cut out locating suitable properties. Jakki and Scott are determined to find a house before the arrival of their baby, while newlyweds Chris and Nicola want a two-bedroom family home in a great location.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Jasmine Harman helps a couple with a £250,000 budget who have decided to move full time to northern Costa Blanca, but first they must choose from five possible homes.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay visits a dog-friendly hotel in West Dover, Vermont, that is in urgent need of help. Owner Sandy MacDougall runs the Four Seasons Inn like a hostel, with unpaid staff staying in the rooms instead of paying guests. The acerbic chef aims to get the business back on track before Sandy loses everything, but wonders whether it would be kinder to simply put this dog-friendly hotel to sleep.(n)

programme.title: Gogglesprogs
programme.desc: Young TV viewers give their honest, inimitable and hilarious take on This Morning and Doctor Who, and sing along to The Sound of Music.(n)

programme.title: The Crystal Maze
programme.desc: Maze Master Richard Ayoade guides Andrea McLean, Spencer Matthews, Tom Allen, Stacey Solomon and Joe Swash through the Aztec, Medieval, Industrial and Futuristic zones. In each one, the contestants must conquer physical, skill, mystery and mental challenges in a bid to win crystals, which add to their time inside the Crystal Dome, where they hope to collect gold tokens to convert into cash for the Stand Up to Cancer charity.(n)

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Nahida from Liverpool is searching for a man who shares her passion for food, and her date is with fellow Liverpudlian Thomas, who describes himself as a loveable bear. Ex-cruise ship worker Dale, 46, has been single for five years since his partner passed away, but is now ready to put his faith in Cupid again, and his date is 39-year-old massage therapist Chris.(n)

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: Self-proclaimed family man James looks forward to the arrival of his fifth child and Kirsty, who was the first triplet to be delivered at Liverpool Women's Hospital returns to have her own baby, hoping motherhood is the key to a more independent life. Meanwhile, an unexpected pregnancy for Jo, still living with her parents at the age of 35, means a busy retirement for first-time grandparents Jean and John.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Michael plans a romantic evening with Jay at an exclusive hotel, but Junior mistakenly cancels the reservation, forcing them to stay at home - where a disaster in the kitchen almost causes the house to burn down. American sitcom, starring Damon Wayans.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Michael's determination to tape an important basketball game prompts him to accidentally record over a home video of baby Kady's first steps - which happens to be one of Jay's most cherished possessions. American sitcom, starring Damon Wayans.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Michael hires super-efficient maid Mrs Hopkins to look after the family, but when she gradually takes over the household, Jay is left feeling surplus to requirements.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Michael's hands are chosen to appear in an advertising campaign, while Franklin feels threatened by Kady's growing friendship with Rachel and tries to drive a wedge between them. American sitcom, starring Damon Wayans.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: The family members play a game which reveals exactly how much they know about each other. American sitcom, starring Damon Wayans.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids

programme.title: My Wife and Kids

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Part one of two. Michael is buzzing with excitement when he heads off to a basketball camp with his all-time sporting hero Michael Jordan.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Part two of two. Michael resorts to some inventive ploys to ensure he is able to still play against his idol. Guest starring Michael Jordan.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Michael is deemed unfit to babysit after he fails a grandparenting course. American family sitcom about a father who stays at home and looks after the kids while their mother goes out to work. Starring Damon Wayans.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Michael gets involved in a dance-off at his high school reunion. American family sitcom about a father who stays at home and looks after the kids while their mother goes out to work. Starring Damon Wayans.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Daily round-up of highlights, revealing how the housemates are getting on under the all-seeing eye of Big Brother. Featuring games, arguments, laughs, diary room visits and bedroom chit-chat, as well as reactions to the latest eviction. Narrated by Marcus Bentley.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: The agents chase almost £3,000 owed by Indian takeaway owners, but when the staff deny any knowledge of the debt, the agents threaten to seize kitchen equipment. In east London they face a race against time to recover more than £8,000 from an electrical services company, and in Cheshire the enforcement agents chase nearly £4,000 of debt owed by a mobile phone shop.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: Experienced enforcement agent Stewart and trainee Iain head to Blackpool to chase down a builder owing nearly £3,500 to an unhappy customer, whilst father and son Del and Dael are in Essex to collect over £2,500 owed to a frozen food company. In south London, Del and Brian attempt to recover nearly £10,000 from a debtor who acted as guarantor for a friend's rental agreement, ending in a bizarre stand-off with the debtor's daughter.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: Paul and Ben try to drill through the locks on a property to evict the residents, only to find to their surprise that the door has been modified with some special reinforced metal. Elsewhere, Delroy and Brian try to reclaim money a garage owes to a customer and are shocked by the condition of the vehicle in question, and a woman who has acted as guarantor for her sister's tenancy does not realise the extent of her responsibilities.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: High Court Enforcement agents evict a large group of squatters barricaded into a disused nursery in London, and have to resort to smashing their way in as they refuse to leave. Meanwhile, agents in Bristol try to recover over £10,000 owed by a plumbing business to a supplier, and emotions run high when they attempt to evict a tenant who pleads her innocence in West London.(n)

programme.title: Blind Date
programme.desc: Paul O'Grady plays cupid for 50-year-old Bournemouth Post Office manager Gary, who claims his loud shirts help him stand out from the crowd. Also seeking love is student Amy from Leeds, who works in a pub, and is nicknamed `Dolly Daydream' by the punters due to her mind's tendency to wander. Both are given a chance to quiz their three potential sweethearts, before choosing one to spend more time with. Plus, Paul catches up with last week's couples.(n)

programme.title: On Benefits
programme.desc: The ongoing documentary series profiling some of Britain's welfare recipients continues, this time highlighting people who are keen to find love, all while struggling to make ends meet. In Norwich, 56-year-old Donna built an alter-ego as a means to escape a life of hand-outs, and is now tentatively trying her hand at online dating. Doncaster resident and sci-fi fan Carl, 39, tries to save some of the £140-a-month he receives in benefits to attend a comic convention, where he hopes to discover a mutual attraction with a like-minded girl. Meanwhile, in Bury St Edmunds, 25-year-old single mother Jade worries her OCD-driven cleaning routine is getting in the way of her quest to find the perfect - and gainfully employed - man.(n)

programme.title: On Benefits
programme.desc: Documentary series about people living on benefits, including 60-year-old Avril, who is one of the long-term unemployed. Her nickname is the Bargain Queen because she spends so much time at car-boot sales - although her biggest bargain so far is a free holiday, courtesy of her mother. Steve has just returned to the UK from Turkey and at 56 is facing unemployment for the first time in his life, and transgender Jess finds jobseeking difficult while she undergoes her transitional medical treatment.(n)

programme.title: Django Unchained
programme.desc: A slave named Django is tracked down by eccentric German bounty hunter Dr King Schultz, who offers him his freedom in exchange for help bringing three criminals to justice. The unlikely allies continue their partnership after the job is done, and fight to rescue Django's wife from a sadistic plantation owner. Quentin Tarantino's Oscar-winning Western, starring Jamie Foxx, Christoph Waltz, Leonardo DiCaprio and Samuel L Jackson.(n)

programme.desc: Journalist John Grogan celebrates his wedding by getting his wife a golden Labrador puppy, hoping to stave off her desire to have children. Over the course of their marriage, the canine remains a constant companion and never loses his mischievous streak even as he grows from a cute puppy to a 7st dog. Comedy drama based on a newspaper column, starring Owen Wilson, Jennifer Aniston, Kathleen Turner and Alan Arkin.(n)

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: Seven Oscar nominations, including Best Picture and Best Actor went to this magical portrait of Scottish playwright J.M. Barrie. The film chronicles his relationship with a young widow and her sons, which inspired "Peter Pan."(n)

programme.title: Eddie the Eagle
programme.desc: Eddie 'The Eagle' Edwards overcomes all odds and extraordinary challenges to become the first British man to compete in the Olympic ski jump event, making him the most famous ski jumper in the history of Great Britain(n)

programme.title: Cocktail
programme.desc: Romantic drama about a materialistic young bartender who begins to reassess his priorities when he finds love. Working in an up-market Manhattan venue, he stages an elaborate cocktail-mixing act with a flashy, older colleague. When the pair fall out because of a woman, the deflated young man heads off to Jamaica. Here, he encounters a beautiful waitress who makes him think again about his decision to swear off romance(n)

programme.title: Welcome to Mooseport
programme.desc: When ex-President Monroe Cole retires to a small town, the locals invite him to run for mayor. Plumber 'Handy' Harrison is planning to run too. Cole persuades Harrison to stand down, but when the statesman starts to romance Handy's girlfriend, the plumber re-enters the race(n)

programme.title: Role Models
programme.desc: A pair of fast-living buddies are given community service which entails looking after two troubled youngsters, one a geeky outcast and the other a potty-mouthed tough(n)

programme.title: Our Brand Is Crisis
programme.desc: A female political consultant is hired to work on the campaign of a Bolivian presidential candidate who has fallen behind in the polls. She faces off against her rival, who is working on the opponent's campaign and is looking for every opportunity to antagonise her(n)

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: In this adventure docudrama set in 1996, several groups of climbers successfully scale Mount Everest, only to be faced with tragedy when a monster snowstorm surprises them as they attempt to make their descent(n)

programme.title: The Amityville Horror
programme.desc: In November 1974, a family of six was brutally murdered. Now, a year later, an unsuspecting young couple, George and Kathy Lutz, and their children move into the house that was the site of the horrific event and is now haunted by a murderous presence. What follows is 28 days of unimaginable terror. With demonic visions of the dead and relentless screams of terror, this is the haunted house story that isn't just a movie - it's real(n)

programme.title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
programme.desc: A remake of the 1951 classic sci-fi film about an alien's foreboding visit to earth(n)

programme.title: The Wedding Singer
programme.desc: Robbie, the wedding singer and Julia, the waitress are both engaged to be married but to the wrong people. Fortune intervenes to help them discover each other(n)

programme.title: To Be or Not to Be
programme.desc: Mel Brooks and his wife Anne Bancroft co-star in this funny remake of a 1942 comedy of the same title, based on a story by Ernst Lubitsch and Melchior Lengyel about a down-and-out Warsaw theater troupe who save the Polish resistance fighters from the SS in World War II. Frederick Bronski (Brooks) leads a struggling theatrical company that offers anything -- from excerpts of Hamlet to stock vaudeville -- if it will pull in an audience. Unknown to Frederick, his wife Anna Bronski (Anne Bancroft) starts up an extra-marital interest in a Polish pilot (Tim Matheson) that could lead to a large-scale disaster. The pilot unknowingly reveals the names of the Bronskis and several resistance fighters to an SS spy (José Ferrer), and by the time he finds out what he has done, he is in London, so he is forced to return surreptitiously to Warsaw as fast as he can to stop the list of names from landing in the hands of the SS chief (Charles Durning). Once the theater troupe is called in to help on this mission, the comedy begins in earnest with the actors donning the guise of Nazis, and Anna seguing into "seductions" of the SS spy and his chief as a part of their battle plan(n)

programme.title: Say Anything...
programme.desc: An unlikely teen romance begins when an underachieving high-school graduate falls for a valedictorian, much to her disapproving father's dismay(n)

programme.title: Swept Away
programme.desc: Spoilt Amber drives ship's mate Giuseppe wild with her rudeness on a boat trip. After a storm strands the pair on a desert island, they begin a very unlikely romance. Love story which attracted near-universal slating(n)

programme.title: I Love You, Man
programme.desc: Friendless Peter Klaven goes on a series of man-dates to find a Best Man for his wedding. But when his insta-bond with his new B.F.F. puts a strain on his relationship with his fiancée, can the trio learn to live happily ever after? Network Television Premiere(n)

programme.title: The Wash
programme.desc: Snoop Dogg and Dr. Dre star in this crudely amusing comedy. They play car-wash workers who---between smoking and selling pot and flirting with women---somehow manage to wash a few cars, but their world is turned upside down when the owner is kidnapped. D.J. Pooh, George Wallace, Angell Conwell, Shawn Fonteno(n)

programme.title: Run Fatboy Run
programme.desc: David Schwimmer's debut directorial feature stars Simon Pegg as Dennis Doyle, seen in the film's opening sequence abandoning a very pregnant Libby Odell at the altar. Five years later, he's an overweight security guard with limited access rights to their son Jake, but still holding a torch for her. When he finds she has a new boyfriend, superfit all-round jock Whit (Hank Azaria), he decides to win her back by entering the same charity marathon as Whit and beating him. With coaching from his landlord and encouragement of sorts from his friend Gordon, he sets off over the start line, but has he prepared enough to make it to the finish?(n)

programme.title: Coyote Ugly
programme.desc: This 21-year-old belle from a small town in New Jersey moves to New York City with aspirations of becoming a songwriter. But reality crashes down hard for this beautiful bumpkin, and soon she finds herself with nothing but a couple of dollars and a sack of returned demo tapes. This is where the 'coyotes' fit in as Violet, now nicknamed 'Jersey', gets a job at the hottest bar in town, Coyote Ugly. She soon finds herself behind and on top of the counter strutting her stuff with the likes of Tyra Banks and calling, as well as pouring, the shots(n)

programme.title: Marauders
programme.desc: Following a brutal bank robbery, the bank owner and his clients became FBI's prime suspects. However, further investigations into the series of heists uncover a deeper conspiracy(n)

programme.title: Hellboy II: The Golden Army
programme.desc: Hellboy isn't about to stand idly by as the planet is purged by a demonic despot, and with a little help from his team at the Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defence, he may just be able to send our otherworldly overlords packing(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Four
programme.desc: Brilliant scientist Reed Richards builds a device that allows users to teleport to an alternate dimension, but an experiment involving it goes wrong and leaves him and his three teammates with unusual superpowers. The quartet are then forced to work together to battle an enemy from their past. This reboot of the iconic Marvel superhero team stars Miles Teller as Richards (who becomes Mr. Fantastic, able to bend and stretch his body into impossible shapes), Michael B. Jordan as Johnny Storm (aka the Human Torch, whose body can erupt in flames), Kate Mara as Sue Storm (aka the Invisible Woman -- no explanation needed), and Jamie Bell as Ben Grimm (who is transformed into the rock monster known as The Thing). Directed by Josh Trank, who previously worked with Jordan on the superhero film Chronicle(n)

programme.title: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me
programme.desc: Austin Powers -- fashion photographer, denizen of Swingin' London, international espionage agent, and bane of dental hygienists everywhere -- returns in his second screen adventure. Powers (once again played by Mike Myers), a 1960s superspy stranded in the 1990s, discovers that his nemesis, criminal genius Dr. Evil (also Mike Myers), has somehow stolen his "mojo" (the secret to his otherwise inexplicable sex appeal) and traveled back in time to the 1960s as part of his latest fiendish scheme. Powers must also travel back in time to retrieve it, but if Austin doesn't quite fit into 1998, he's been there just long enough not to fit in in 1968 anymore, either. Powers also discovers that Dr. Evil has new allies this time: Mini-Me (Verne Troyer), a clone of Dr. Evil one-eighth his size but just as nasty; Fat Bastard (Myers yet again), whose name describes him just fine; and vixenish assassin Robin Swallows (Gia Carides). Powers' lack of mojo also proves troublesome when he's paired with his new partner, saucy CIA operative Felicity Shagwell (Heather Graham). Other characters returning from the first film include Elizabeth Hurley as Vanessa Kensington, Robert Wagner as Number Two, Michael York as Basil Exposition, Seth Green as Scott Evil, and Mindy Sterling as Frau Farbissina. Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me also includes cameo appearances from Tim Robbins, Jerry Springer, Woody Harrelson, and Burt Bacharach with his current songwriting partner, Elvis Costello(n)

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.desc: When four young free divers come upon a legendary shipwreck rumoured to contain millions in gold, they believe their dreams of buried treasure has come true. But nearby on the ocean floor they unearth another, more sinister mystery..(n)

programme.title: The Rookie
programme.desc: Nick Pulovski is a cop, presently assigned to the auto theft division. When he discovers that a man named Strom is the brains behind a major car theft and chop shop ring, he sees this as his opportunity to do something big. After his partner is killed, the case is then transferred to homicide, so he is taken off the case. And he is assigned a new partner, a cop who would prefer to play by the rules(n)

programme.title: Dark Water
programme.desc: Ghost story about a divorced woman and her daughter who move into a creepy apartment building off New York City's East River. The haunting conditions force the residents to examine the history of the building's former tenants(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Buying goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: Nick and Riley investigate an attack on a skydiver who was critically injured when his parachute failed to open. Meanwhile, Catherine and Greg are called to a double murder and it seems the two cases share a surprising connection. Elsewhere, Langston struggles to solve the death of a religious fanatic in the desert as Brass questions the prime suspect, one of the victim's followers. George Eads stars.(n)

programme.title: Nightmare 911
programme.desc: A police 911 operator is fired after mistaking a real murder for a prank call, and feeling guilty for allowing the crime to happen, she sets out to find the killer herself before he or she strikes again. Thriller, starring Fiona Gubelmann, Scott Bailey and John Lee Ames.(n)

programme.title: False Pretenses
programme.desc: A woman's life is left in tatters when her wealthy husband finds he has been conned out of millions by his best friend, and kills himself. Escaping the painful memories, she moves elsewhere and slowly begins to rebuild her life - until the conman hunts her down. Thriller, starring Peta Wilson.(n)

programme.title: Columbo: Double Exposure
programme.desc: A maker of motivational films based on subliminal messages uses his expertise to plant a subconscious command in the mind of a rival to lure him to his death. However, any hopes of his getting away with it are dashed by the arrival of a certain shabby sleuth. Crime drama, starring Peter Falk, Robert Culp, Robert Middleton, Louise Latham and Arlene Martel.(n)

programme.title: Columbo: Publish or Perish
programme.desc: A ruthless publisher hires a hitman to kill a best-selling author who has threatened to sign with a rival company - but reckons without the involvement of the cigar-smoking sleuth, who is determined to put the culprit behind bars. Crime drama, starring Peter Falk, Mickey Spillane, Jack Cassidy and John Chandler.(n)

programme.title: Columbo: Lovely but Lethal
programme.desc: A cosmetics company is rocked by the revelation that a pirated version of their latest product is on the market, and then, shortly afterwards, one of their chemists is found murdered. But when the shabby sleuth scrutinises the case, he suspects the events are linked to a rival company. Detective drama, starring Peter Falk, Vincent Price, Martin Sheen and Vera Miles.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: A blogger who devoted his energies to exposing corruption within government is found dead and it transpires he had recently suggested that some Navy Seals had overstepped the mark in their use of force. As the team gets to grips with the case hoping the claims are wrong, another body turns up with its tongue removed, and near the body a hair is found that guides investigators to a suspect - a Navy Seal. However, the possibility that the team is being deliberately led astray remains. Scott Bakula and Lucas Black star.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The Navy's finest female pilot dies at an air show while demonstrating a state-of-the-art aircraft about to be brought into service. Fearing the press will have a field day over the capability of women pilots, a senior Navy officer calls for the team's help to determine the cause. While the evidence initially points to error, a new autopsy reveals another line of inquiry, which ends in the investigators racing to prevent another accident. Scott Bakula and Lucas Black star.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: A hit-and-run driver kills a man working on the campaign for an aspiring senator, but it soon becomes a case of national security when closer examination of the video footage makes it clear he was murdered. The agents' job is to figure out whether it is an isolated incident or part of a politically motivated plot that might put others in danger - and most of the pressure is on Kensi, who takes the victim's old job and goes undercover in the campaign office.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Mac uncovers a murder on board a commercial flight from New York to Washington DC and sets up a makeshift crime lab to catch the killer. The case takes an unexpected twist with the discovery that the victim, an escaped convict with a history of drug-running, was posing as a federal air marshal to smuggle cash out of the country.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Evidence found at a murder scene links the victim to a number of high-profile figures, including police chief Brigham Sinclair and the benefactor who made Hawkes' career possible. The detectives learn the killer stole a data stick, but find their inquiries hindered by a private investigator trying to suppress sensitive information about his employer. Crime drama, starring Gary Sinise, Melina Kanakaredes and Mykelti Williamson.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A rapist begins to escalate his crimes, attacking victims more than once - and Dr Huang suspects he has a particularly disturbing motive for targeting them. However, tensions flare between Stabler and Beck as they make a difficult decision to help catch whoever is responsible. Crime drama, starring Christopher Meloni, Mariska Hargitay and Dann Florek.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Novak tries to track down Benson, whose testimony is vital to the successful outcome of a rape prosecution - but she is living under the assumed identity of a green activist and has infiltrated a group suspected of being eco-terrorists. Arrested during a confrontation with police, she is questioned over her fellow members' suspected involvement in a murder, and sets out to prove their innocence. Drama, starring Mariska Hargitay.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A distinctive tattoo on the body of a dead teenage girl leads Stabler and Beck to a foster home - which proves to be a cover for a child-prostitution ring. Learning the victim was one of several girls working for a pimp named Victor, the pair set about convincing the others to testify against him. Drama, starring Christopher Meloni and Mariska Hargitay.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Two children are found handcuffed to their seats but miraculously alive in the back of a van submerged in a river. The ensuing investigation links the case to a mysterious death involving a controversial therapy technique, and eventually leads the team to a seemingly abusive foster family. Crime drama, starring Christopher Meloni, Mariska Hargitay and Dann Florek.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler struggle to identify the cause of a woman's death in Central Park, and follow a trail of clues that leads to a mute homeless man, who turns out to be a better witness than anticipated. After they discover a rare toxic agent was the murder weapon, and that the victim was a millionaire, they suspect her husband could be the culprit because his dance troupe had been in financial difficulty. Guest starring Chris Sarandon (ER), with Mariska Harqitay and Christopher Meloni.(n)

programme.title: Castle
programme.desc: While Beckett and the author try to unravel an apparently confused woman's detailed and convincing confession to a murder, further people come forward professing their guilt of the same crime. American crime drama, starring Nathan Fillion and Stana Katic.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The discovery of a woman's body in the East River leads Briscoe and Green to investigate the drug-addicted brother of a famous footballer - and as the case unfolds, it becomes clear she may not have been the killer's only victim. Crime drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Jesse L Martin.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Green think they have got their man when the prime suspect in a murder investigation knows every detail about the killing. However, when he claims he acquired his information from a psychic vision, the detectives have their work cut out. Jerry Orbach and Jesse L Martin star.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Teacher Evan Westcott shoots at senatorial candidate Grant Hamilton during a political rally, with Lindsay being hurt in the ensuing chaos and a tragedy occurring when a boy picks up the discarded firearm. The investigators recover bullets from the crime scene and match the casings to a gun registered to Hamilton, but the politician claims it was stolen during a break-in at his home. Guest starring Neal McDonough (Desperate Housewives, Justified).(n)

programme.title: Access
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip.(n)

programme.title: A Date to Die For
programme.desc: A recent divorcee, suffering from bipolar disorder, accepts a date with a single father. The next morning, she awakens to find her date's dead body in her bed, a knife plunged in his chest. Trying to piece together her memories of the previous night, she sets out to defend her reputation and the lives of her family by locating the killer herself. Thriller, starring Victoria Pratt.(n)

programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip.(n)

programme.desc: A recent divorcee, suffering from bipolar disorder, accepts a date with a single father. Using documents discovered on the victim's boat, Abby links her to Barry Norton, who is suspected of having sold government secrets to a Middle Eastern terrorist group known as the SRC.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Curtis uncovers evidence of police corruption that puts the DA's office into conflict with an ambitious judge, and Briscoe comes under investigation for stealing evidence from a police lockup. Crime drama, with Sam Waterston and Jerry Orbach.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A janitor is found murdered, leading the team to a schizophrenic student they discover has been part of an experimental drug programme. Though all evidence points to the youngster, it transpires that he had no motive to commit the crime and the police soon turn their attentions to a psychiatrist. Sam Waterston stars.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The team investigates the murders of attorney Mitchell Hindle and mechanical engineer Justin Vanderheyden, with both victims turning out to have been shot with the same type of bullet. Adam hacks Justin's cell phone and finds that he was supposed to meet with a venture capitalist the night before, while Hawkes discovers that he had used 3D metal printing to create a gun. Crime drama, starring Gary Sinise, Carmine Giovinazzo and Hill Harper.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A Navy captain wearing a colourful costume underneath his uniform is shot and killed in a flower shop, and further investigation reveals he was leading a double life as a masked vigilante. Vance brings in Tony's ex-fiancee, journalist Wendy Miller, who claims the victim had been trying to expose a scandal, and as the team pursues the case, a real-estate scam is uncovered. Guest starring Perrey Reeves (Entourage).(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A Navy reservist is found dead in his home with marks around his neck, and Gibbs and the team discover he was working on a highly classified case for the department of defence. The circumstances surrounding the man's demise lead the investigators to suspect someone was secretly trying to drive him insane, bringing them into contact with Samantha Ryan, the director of a division specialising in psychological warfare. Guest starring Jamie Lee Curtis.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Part one of two. Hanna receives a call for help from a former CIA colleague, only to find the man dead in an apparent suicide. Further investigations reveal his phone call was pre-recorded, putting the team onto the trail of a conspiracy that sees Deeks and Kensi go undercover at a dog show - complete with prize poodle - to look into a breeder the victim was investigating before he died. LL Cool J, Chris O'Donnell, Daniela Ruah and Eric Christian Olsen star.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A priest asks Stabler to meet a terminally ill man who has a secret he wants to share with his estranged daughter, leading the detective to discover the patient's involvement in a series of unsolved bank robberies during the 1970s. As the investigation progresses, they find a bomb shelter containing millions of dollars and the skeleton of his former partner-in-crime. Guest starring Brian Dennehy and Paget Brewster, with Christopher Meloni and Mariska Hargitay.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman accuses her estranged husband of breaking into her home and raping her. As the man has no history of violence and the victim refuses to allow her daughter to answer questions, the detectives are split over where the truth lies, and Benson is concerned that Stabler's judgement is being clouded by his own divorce. Drama, starring Christopher Meloni and Mariska Hargitay.(n)

programme.desc: Band of Brothers. The Villalobos crew are devastated by Chong's cancer diagnosis, but Tia and the twins try to make the best of a sad situation(n)

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Buried Alive. The NBA's Zach Randolph tells Tia about a dog that was rescued in Memphis after being trapped in a drainpipe for days. Back in New Orleans, a puppy rescued in the 9th Ward is prepared for adoption(n)

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Dead Moose Talking. A moose that's been shot and left in the woods prompts a large-scale investigation. Meanwhile, Richardson finds a convicted felon thanks to a camouflaged ATV; and MacCabe encounters an unusual hunter(n)

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: The Big Bad Woods. Hunters get angry with Lounder over an illegal deer; wardens search for a missing hunter; MacCabe gets help from a nonagenarian to catch someone who's been deer baiting(n)

programme.title: Railroad Alaska
programme.desc: The Big Freeze. Jim and Nancy rush to make repairs before the Alaskan winter chases them out of their home. Dan decides to sell his cabin, but first he must find a buyer(n)

programme.title: Railroad Alaska
programme.desc: Ice Hell. An elite crew of workers - engineers, construction crews, and train drivers - battle ferocious weather to keep the State of Alaska's 500-mile long railroad rolling(n)

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier: The Frozen Edge
programme.desc: Fish Gone Foul. The end of the summer harvest gives the Kilchers no breaks from Mother Nature as a fishing trip goes awry and a beehive colony is dying off for unknown reasons(n)

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier: The Frozen Edge
programme.desc: The Fall Hunt. The change of seasons has reached the frontier and the Kilchers will need to hunt and search for food in more dangerous and remote locations to sustain their winter stockpiles(n)

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier: The Frozen Edge
programme.desc: Cattle Drive Tribute. The Kilchers lose a friend as winter approaches and they'll have to drive his herd of cattle after his passing, but the journey is as emotional as it is rough and rugged(n)

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier: The Frozen Edge
programme.desc: The Rising Tide. Winter is settling into the frontier. A storm has caused dangerous conditions for The Kilchers and their cattle herd, with the risk that some of their livestock may have washed out to sea(n)

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier: The Frozen Edge
programme.desc: Winter's Delay. The Kilchers are still stockpiling as winter seems to be coming late this year. They need to use the extra time to continue stocking up their freezers for the inevitable deep freeze(n)

programme.title: Human Prey
programme.desc: Feeding Frenzy. A chimpanzee escapes its enclosure at an animal sanctuary and chases a volunteer; a surfer is knocked off his board and attacked by a great white shark just as he's about to catch a wave(n)

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier: The Frozen Edge
programme.desc: The Rising Tide. Winter is settling into the frontier. A storm has caused dangerous conditions for The Kilchers and their cattle herd, with the risk that some of their livestock may have washed out to sea(n)
